titles: Fancies Phoenix. Or The peerless paragon of the times. Being a young gallants description of a lady which hee hath settled his thoughts on, resolving never to change, nor to love any other beauty or face in the world. And is perswaded if there bee, a ph≈ìnix in the world, 'tis shee. To an amorous new tune.
author: H., C.
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
